    - name: configure cmake32
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win32'
      run: |
           cmake -S . -B build32 -Dlsl_DIR=LSL/share/LSL -A Win32
           
    - name: configure cmake64
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win64'
      run: |
           cmake -S . -B build64 -Dlsl_DIR=LSL/share/LSL -A x64
        
    - name: build32
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win32'
      run: |
           cmake --build build32 --config Release -j --target install
    - name: build64
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win64'
      run: |
           cmake --build build64 --config Release -j --target install
           
    - name: package32
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win32'
      run: |
           cmake --build build32 --config Release -j --target package
           
    - name: package64
      if: matrix.platform == 'Win64'
      run: |
           cmake --build build64 --config Release -j --target package
           
    - name: Upload Artifacts
      uses: actions/upload-artifact@v2-preview
      with:
        name: pkg-LiveAmp-v1.19.5-${{ matrix.platform }}
        path: build*
